snippet: Militia fighters have released a government minister seized more than two weeks ago in the Central African Republic, officials and relatives said Wednesday.
abstract: Militia members in Central African Republic release Armel Mingatoloum Sayo, government official abducted in capital Bangui in January.
lead_paragraph: Militia fighters have released a government minister seized more than two weeks ago in the Central African Republic, officials and relatives said Wednesday.

headline.main: Central African Republic: Kidnapped Official Is Freed
headline.print_headline: Central African Republic: Kidnapped Official Is Freed
